mapper.insert: insert into city.contest(name, time_limit, question_number, archive_status, contest_id) values (#{name}, #{time_limit}, #{question_number}, #{archive_status}, #{contest_id})
mapper.update: update city.contest set name = #{name}, time_limit = #{time_limit}, question_number = #{question_number}, archive_status = #{archive_status}, contest_id = #{contest_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from city.contest
and `name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
